website_summaries.verdict: A silky, moisturizing shaving cream that's worth trying if you have sensitive skin.
pros: Vitamin E, aloe, and olive butter moisturize and soothe skin
Rich lather allows razor to glide over skin
cons: May still cause a reaction on sensitive skin in rare cases

customer_reviews.title: Very Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a long time, and it's very moisturizing. I shave my underarms and legs every other day with this and a Gillette Venus Sensitive Disposable Razor. This gel is great for sensitive skin and makes the razor glide effortlessly over the skin. I like that I can buy in bulk on amazon. Great product. I highly recommend this shaving gel.
customer_reviews.author: Katie - MI

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. It came with six bottles. All six stopped working at half empty. I assume some kind of pressure problem?? Not sure. But it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: It was one of the only shaving gels offered in Subscribe & Save. Works decent, but not the kind I would have normally bought.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Silky
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this shaving cream. I have very sensitive skin and have tried so many different products that end up making my legs break out in small skin irritations, to the most painful razor burn. This feels amazing on my skin and leaves it feeling so smooth and silky after shaving! Would definitely recommend this for those with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: KCalJ

customer_reviews.title: I received this product in a good package with no problems with anything and I would ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this product in a good package with no problems with anything and I would buy it again. I like this product because it works with my skin since it is sensitive so I do not break out and makes me shaving really nice.
customer_reviews.author: wildcat

customer_reviews.title: Itchy legs
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has very itchy legs. This is the best shaving cream for her. She loves how it lathers and smells and is sensitive to her legs.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Sims

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it, works good for manscaping
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it and it's pretty much all she uses. I use it as well as it works good for some manscaping as well.
customer_reviews.author: SnR811

customer_reviews.title: Best for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different sensitive skin brands and this is the only one that does NOT irritate my very sensitive skin, and it doesn't clog up the razor. Be sure to get the gel - not the lotion. I wish the sensitive skin version was easier to find in stores. I order the 6-pack from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Jones

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my skin smooth
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about six months now. It leaves my skin smooth after shaving and it doesnt irritate my sensitive skin. I find that a very small amount is all that is needed since it foams up very nicely as you apply it to your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sue N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a gel, used for shaving. I am told it does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: GamerGod

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, but these cans do not seem to hold as much as they used to?
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy shave
customer_reviews.text: I like the texture of this product. My skin does well with it. Shaving is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Anush Smith

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Skintimate Shaving Gels for a long time. I have used the different varieties including this one with the vitamins and aloe (in the purple can) and the Sensitive Skin (in the pink can) and really like them all as long as it's the gel. I feel like the gel works better and a little dab foams up into a fairly firm foam to go a long way and stands up to get a very smooth shave. There is never any irritation and skin feels smooth and well moisturized. The gels all have a great scent too. I am glad I can buy them on Amazon for a reasonable price and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Choosey Shopper

product_meta.title: Skintimate Skin Therapy Moisturizing Shave Gel for Women with Vitamin E, Aloe, and Olive Butter for Sensitive Skin - 7 Ounce (Pack of 6)
product_meta.description: We're sensitive to your shaving needs. Skintimate(r) Sensitive Skin Women's Shave Gel is formulated for skin just like yours. With aloe, Vitamin E and other conditioners and lubricants, the formula helps moisturize and soften skin while helping to protect against nicks and cuts.
feature_bullets: MOISTURE-RICH Lotionized gel formulations contain nourishing moisturizers and vitamins to help replenish skin's natural moisture.
FOAMS into a rich creamy lather and allows the razor to glide easily over skin
UNBEATABLE razor protection for a close, comfortable shave and healthy feeling, smooth skin

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
